rule.description: If Seaside Ringleader's card element changes in the graveyard, non-water, tamer champions may be able to activate its ability. For example, if Nullifying Lantern changes this card's element to norm in the graveyard, and you control a norm element champion (usually by having at least one norm elment champion card in lineage), then you may activate this card's ability.
